message.name: ERR_SUBJECT_NOT_GIVEN
message.locale: No subject text given.

message.name: ERR_TICKETDATA_RCE
message.locale: This record has recently been modified by another user and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TICKETDATA_RDE
message.locale: This record has been deleted by another user and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TICKETHISTORY_RCE
message.locale: This record has recently been modified by another user and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TICKETHISTORY_RDE
message.locale: This record has been deleted by another user and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_DUEDATE_PAST
message.locale: The deadline and time cannot be in the past.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_DATA_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: There is no task data for this task ID: %1s.

message.name: ERR_TASK_ASSIGNEE_EMPTY
message.locale: No assignee has been entered for the task.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_FV_TYPE
message.locale: You must specify type for this Task.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_FV_PRIORITY
message.locale: You must specify priority for this Task.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_FV_STATUS
message.locale: You must specify status for this Task.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_FV_STATUS_CLOSED_NON_CHANGEABLE
message.locale: This task is closed and thus it cannot be %1s.

message.name: INF_TICKET_STATUS_ACCEPTED
message.locale: accepted

message.name: INF_TICKET_STATUS_REJECTED
message.locale: rejected

message.name: ERR_TICKET_CASESECURITY_RIGHTS_ASSIGNEE_USER
message.locale: User to which this task is being assigned or redirected does not have maintenance rights for this case. Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_CASESECURITY_RIGHTS_ASSIGNEE_MANAGER
message.locale: Assignee's manager does not have maintenance rights for this case. Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_CASESECURITY_RIGHTS_ASSIGNEE_CONCERNROLE
message.locale: Client to which this task is being assigned does not have maintenance rights for this case. Please contact your security administrator.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_CONCERNROLE_SENSITIVE_USER
message.locale: User to which this task is being assigned or redirected does not have access to this client's details.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_CONCERNROLE_SENSITIVE_USER_MANAGER
message.locale: Assignee's manager does not have access to this client's details.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_CONCERNROLE_SENSITIVE_CONCERNROLE
message.locale: Client to which this task is being assigned does not have access to this client's details.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: There is no task matching this ticket ID: %1s.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_HISTORY_DOES_NOT_EXIST
message.locale: There is no task history matching this taskID

message.name: ERR_TICKET_RCE
message.locale: This record has recently been modified by another user and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_RDE
message.locale: This record has been deleted by another user and cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_USER_ID_NOT_IN_ORGANIZATIONUNIT
message.locale: The user specified is not a member of the organization unit.
The user specified is not a member of the organisation unit.

message.name: INF_CASE_REVIEW_CREATED
message.locale: Case review task created for case %1s of type %2s for %3s.

message.name: INF_CASE_REVIEW_EVENT_CREATED
message.locale: Reviews for case %1s of type %2s for %3s have been created.

message.name: INF_MOD_ASSIGNED_OWNER
message.locale: Assigned Owner Changed:

message.name: INF_MOD_OWNER
message.locale: Owner Changed:

message.name: INF_MOD_PRIORITY
message.locale: Priority Changed:

message.name: INF_MOD_RESOLUTION
message.locale: Resolution:

message.name: INF_MOD_STATUS
message.locale: Status Changed:

message.name: INF_REPAYMENT_NOT_PROCESSED
message.locale: Liability repayment cannot be processed.

message.name: ERR_SYSCR_ASSG_NO_OU_OR_USER
message.locale: No organization unit ID or user name was given for the task's assigned owner. Cannot create the ticket.
No organisation unit ID or user name was given for the task's assigned owner. Cannot create the ticket.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_FV_TASK_ACTIVE
message.locale: Task ID "%1s" is active.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_TASKSEARCHDATE_BLANK
message.locale: You have selected a filtered search therefore a Task search date must be supplied.

message.name: INF_MOD_HOURSWORKED
message.locale: Hours Worked Changed:

message.name: INF_MOD_DUEDATECHANGED
message.locale: Deadline Changed:

message.name: INF_MOD_DUEDATEBLANK
message.locale: No Deadline

message.name: INF_MOD_DUEDATETOBLANK
message.locale: The deadline has been removed.

message.name: ERR_TICKET_FV_TASK_NOT_CLOSED_STILL_EXIST
message.locale: You can not close a case while tasks that have not been closed still exist.
